title: The Girl in the Sea
description: The Bates family moves to ORCA to research whales. While trying to tag a whale, Jason Bates has a surprising encounter.

title: Set Adrift
description: Vanessa, the new girl on ORCA, doesn't take her welcome-prank too well. As an act of revenge, she pulls a prank on Brett. Only that her prank turns dangerous when a storm approaches.

title: Wall of Death
description: The Bates-Brothers encounter Neri once more while trying to get rid of an illegal fishing net.

title: The Earthquake
description: After an earthquake hits ORCA, two kids are trapped in a damaged section, which is filling with water.

title: Human Tears
description: Jason talks to Neri about the divorce of his parents. Meanwhile, Dianne is trying to convince Commander Lucas to ratify new equipment for her lab and Brett is convinced that his mother wants Commander Lucas to be his step-father.

title: Property Developers
description: Property Developers want to turn Neri's island into a big holiday resort. Jason and Neri must work together to save her home.

title: Toxic Waste
description: Neri brings Jason's attention to a toxic dump in the ocean. When Jason is reprimanded for leaving an important project, it is up to Lee, Brett, Froggy and Zoe to prove to Commander Lucas that the dumping of waste in the ocean is occurring.

title: Day Pass
description: Jason agrees to show Neri his and Jason's home on ORCA. After stealing one of Vanessa's uniforms and obtaining a fake ID from Froggy, Brett begins a long-winded tour of ORCA that he hopes will bore Neri into making her visit a short one.

title: Romance
description: As the kids are preparing for their shore leave to Port Douglas, Neri makes a surprise visit that forces Jason and Brett to take her with them. Damien invites Neri to see a movie but the experience frightens her and she runs off.

title: Major Breakthrough
description: New monitoring equipment allows Dianne and Winston to hear Neri's communications with Charlie, but when the tag on Charlie stops working, Dianne must go out and replace it.

title: Industrial Spy
description: Dianne asks Neri to help with her research on whales, Dianne is especially curious as to how Neri is able to communicate with Charlie.

title: Neri's Secret
description: The spy takes the stolen whale recordings back to Dr. Hellegren at UBRI--Hellegren wants to be the first person to communicate with whales. Dianne's tests on Neri reveal a remarkable telepathic ability.

title: Tough Decision
description: Jason and Brett round up their friends to help rescue Charlie, but Jason must also tell them the truth about Neri. Dianne destroys all of her research on Neri after Commander Lucas tells her that he will have to file a report on Neri.

title: The Return
description: Jason and Brett eagerly await the return of Neri and Charlie-as does UBRI's Dr. Hellegren who wants to study just one of the returning humpback whales, Charlie.

title: Where No Whale Swims
description: Neri makes her first visit to ORCA since her return, and tells her friends that she wants to discover who "her people" were. Jason, Brett and Neri go to her island to look for clues to her identity.

title: Father's Message
description: The gang begins to dig for Neri's spaceship on the beach on part of the island Neri has never visited. The gang seem to be finding a huge spaceship and Neri brings Jason to the entrance of the ship deep under water.

title: Records and Recollections
description: The search for Neri's sister Mera is underway. Mick asks Froggy to use his computer to change his grades but Froggy won't do it. Commander Byrne isn't pleased with her son's grades but Mick once again charms his way out of trouble.

title: Mera
description: The kids locate Mera. Her adopted name is Jane Seaforth, and after being bounced from foster family to foster family, she is now living at an institute for gifted children.

title: The Institute
description: Jason, Brett, Froggy, and Zoe return to the institute to get Mera but Dr. Hellegren arrives there as well wanting to take Mera back to UBRI with him.

title: No Place Like Home
description: Mera is having a difficult time adjusting to living on the island and Neri leaves her alone while she goes to help with the survey again. Mick gets Froggy to use HELEN to spy on Vanessa's counseling session.

title: Our Island
description: Suspecting a connection between Neri and Jane Seaforth, Dr. Hellegren sends UBRI agents Forsyth and Liselle to ORCA to learn as much as they can about the two girls.

title: Underwater and Undercover
description: Neri returns to help Dianne with her oceanographic survey leaving Mera alone on the island to face a UBRI search party that has come to the island looking for them.

title: Secrets Out
description: Prior to leaving on the final survey mission, Dianne learns Commander Byrne has assigned Froggy, Zoey, Joanne, Rocky and Kimberly to her crew. Forsyth hides a transmitter on the boat to allow UBRI to follow it.

title: Sabotage
description: Jason takes Neri and Mera swimming off the ORCA platform. Mick finds out and heads out on a jetski, he falls off and must be rescued by the girls. Neri helps Mick with his reading, he in turn joins the others in keeping Neri and Mera a secret.

title: The Arrival
description: Neri leaves ORCA intending to save Mera and Charlie by giving herself up to UBRI. Brett chases after her, gets into an accident with a UBRI boat and is saved by Neri.

title: The Return
description: Neri and Mera make the decision to return to the Ocean Planet and convince Diane that her research must continue. Froggy fixes HELEN, with a little help from Damien. Commander Byrne has Forsythe arrested when HELEN identifies him as the saboteur.

title: Danger in the Reef
description: Winston calls Dianne and her sons back from their vacation informing them that UBRI has won the contract to construct ORCA City and their plans threaten a nearby fish breading ground.

title: Amnesia
description: Brett talks Jason and Neri into looking for a way into the spacecraft they found buried on Neri's island their search is unsuccessful. Brett and Benny meet Cassandra, a new arrival from ORCA's sister station near Florida.

title: Draining the Spaceship
description: Jason and Brett steal a pump from UBRI supplies on ORCA so they can pump out the spaceship. Cass and Brett trade practical jokes but when they team up to get Cass's sister Morgan, they also catch the Commander in their soapy trap.

title: Kal Who Knows No Fear
description: Jason and Brett are about to force the chamber open when Neri finds the controls that open the chamber and revive its occupant. He comes to and says his name is Kal. He is shown around the island where he seems to be content to live.

title: Diving Around Obtacles
description: Concerned about Kal's development, Neri asks Jason to talk to him. After telling him to stay on the island, Kal follows Neri to ORCA.

title: Winston and Water
description: Hoping to keep Kal from making any return trips to ORCA, Jason suggests to Neri that she show him around the spaceship which he has been interested in.

title: A Super-Sportsman
description: Neri goes to ORCA to see how Jason and Brett are going with their search for the Synchronium. Dianne takes the opportunity to ask her to help Winston with his dive test which she agrees to do.

title: Extraterrestial Abilities
description: Neri awakes on the island to find Kal missing, he's gone to ORCA. Jason and Brett introduce Kal to Diane and Winston. Shortly after, Neri arrives and tells Diane about UBRI's plans to use explosives on the ocean floor in their construction.

title: The Capsule in the Desert
description: Brett locates another piece of Synchronium but interrupts Jason's training exercise to tell him the news. UBRI has also located the piece and mount an effort to retrieve it.

title: Benny in Trouble
description: Neri moves the Synchronium piece to her secret underwater cave to keep it safe. Benny's father chastises him for spending time with Brett and Cass instead of studying.

title: Cassandra's Nightmare
description: A trip to ORCA prompts a discussion between Neri and Kal about feelings. Cass is beginning to remember about her time on Neri's island in her dreams.

title: The Helicopter Exam
description: Neri continues to teach Kal about feelings. Cass is still having her dreams about her time on Neri's island and now remembers Brett being there.

title: Lena's Betrayal
description: Neri receives a message from Mera in a dream warning her that time is running out. Neri goes to ORCA where she warns Dianne that UBRI's development must be stopped.

title: Changes
description: HELEN is not being cooperative in the kids' search for more pieces of the Synchronium. Meanwhile, UBRI has located another piece. With nowhere to go after leaving home, Jason and Brett convince their mother into letting Lena stay with them on ORCA.

title: The Spy
description: Winston is excited about the arrival of Camilla Sabato (Robyn Gibes) to ORCA, she is a science writer but more importantly, a close friend.

title: Gamma Level: Radioactive
description: Dianne demands that a tribunal hearing be convened to stop UBRI's development, but Hellegren argues that there is no connection between the earthquake and UBRI's explosions.

title: Charlie Is Stranded
description: Brett tries unsuccessfully to get Kal to come out of the spaceship. Dianne is granted a tribunal hearing to voice her concerns about the effects UBRI's construction is having on the fault line.

title: The Love Letter
description: Kellar shows Dr. Hellegren the footage she took of Kal on the sandbar, he quickly recognizes who Kal is and wants to capture him. After another of Kal's outbursts at Jason, Neri tells him to change his attitude or leave the island, Kal chooses the latter.

title: Jason and the Abyss
description: Neri continues to look for Kal but Jason suggests Kal is just trying to teach them a lesson by staying away. Neri receives another warning from Mera.

title: Eavesdropper
description: Kal is in the lap of luxury at UBRI, his room filled with all sorts of toys and games. Kellar, making reference to his failed relationship with Lena, angers Dr. Hellegren by suggesting he is treating Kal like an "obedient son."

title: Water in the Desert
description: Neri has Kal promise not to leave the island again. Lena uses HELEN to locate another piece of the Synchronium. Mera appears to Neri to again warns her that time is running out.

title: The Safe Deposit Key
description: The cadets' exam results are in and after looking at hers, Sallyanne tells Jason he would be better off with another partner. Mera reveals to Neri and her friends that Charlie's song is the trigger that activates the Synchronium.

title: The China Man
description: A large quake hits keeping Lena from accessing HELEN to look for more of the Synchronium.

title: The Stone Fish
description: Budds The growing frequency of the seismic tremors causes Commander Wellington to call for voluntary evacuations of ORCA personnel. Cass tells Morgan to "drop dead" when Morgan gets after Jason for wanting to skip a survey dive.

title: Time Bomb in the Jungle
description: The effects of the new "Winston Seth" fault line are being felt all around the Pacific Rim as evacuations on ORCA are taking place. Lena locates the final piece of the Synchronium.

title: The Last Chance
description: A large quake prompts the commander to call for an evacuation of all ORCA personnel under the age of 18.

title: Operation Sphinx
description: Brett and Jason are out testing a new diving suit when Jason encounters a strange bright light while under water, the pair quickly leave and head off to see Neri.

title: The Mysterious Pyramid
description: Dianne is at ORCA Pacific headquarters for her interview, she is surprised to discover her exhusband in the role of interviewer and more surprised to learn the job is hers if she wants it.

title: The Transport
description: Neri, Jason, and Brett wander into an archaeological dig and meet Professor Malakat and Shersheba. Finding the minifin abandoned, Winston tracks the signal from Brett's vid-phone to the Middle East, but discounts his findings as a phantom signal.

title: The Golden Ankh
description: From the DNA sample obtained from a strand of Neri's hair, PRAXIS identifies Neri as an alien and makes her capture their top priority.

title: Stranded in the Desert
description: Leaving the cave to find help, Jason is found by Jakamarra who drives him back to the others but won't take them with him citing a legend about a "whale woman" who was pursued after leaving the very same cave.

title: The Lie Detector
description: With Jason and Brett back on ORCA, agents Shelby and Hauser arrive soon after looking for Neri.

title: The Bug
description: Praxis closes in and apprehends the kids at the farm. Jason and Brett are returned to ORCA while Neri is transported, by boat, to Praxis headquarters. En route, Charlie jostles the boat allowing Neri to escape and jump overboard.

title: A Wrong Friend
description: Shersheba makes a surprise visit to ORCA and Dianne gives Jason the task of showing her around the station.

title: The Hunt for the Golden Ankh
description: Praxis's return to ORCA prompts Cass and Brett to seek Winston's help to delete all of Helen's records of Neri.

title: The History of the Whale Woman
description: Jakamarra takes Jason and Neri to where he has hidden the Golden Ankh. Malakat is able to determine the location of the cave in the outback and informs Praxis of the Neri's whereabouts.

title: Cheat
description: Neri is taken back to Praxis headquarters where she is interrogated. Neri's captures prompts Jason to put the Ankh out of reach of Malakat and Shersheba, he drops it into the deep ocean.

title: Imprisoned in the Bunker
description: Malakat and Shersheba attempt to unleash the power of the pyramid by are told by Shalamorn that the Ankh must be prepared first. Praxis resorts to using experimental procedure to keep a deteriorating Neri alive.

title: Attempt at Revival
description: Neri is brought back to ORCA but she cannot be revived. Malakat and Shersheba successfully charge the ankh. Praxis destroys all their records of Project Sphinx and agent Hauser hands in her resignation.

title: The Snake Bite
description: Jason and Winston climb the mountain on Neri's island to install surveillance equipment. Making their descent, Winston is bitten by a snake and falls the rest of the way down.

title: A Spirit Appears
description: Jason and Brett return with Neri to their father's farm for Jason's birthday but soon after arriving Paul is called away on business. While at the farm, Neri has a series of encounters with a strange young girl by the name of Emma.

title: Helen Learns the Laughter
description: On the Ocean Planet, Mera is pursued by the rebels but is able to reach safety in the Pyramid of the Elders. A group of rebels arrives on Earth. They pursue Neri are driven off by Jason and Brett in the minifin.

title: Mera Escapes to Earth
description: Mera's spacecraft splashes down in the ocean and as she swims to the surface she is surrounded by Commandos. Seeing the craft come down from the island, Brett, Neri and Jason rush out to rescue Mera.

title: The Race
description: Richter talks Elly Hauser into rejoining agent Shelby on newly a reopened Project Phoenix. Winston, Cass and Brett program Helen to provide 'just the facts' if questioned about pyramids.

title: The Attack
description: Shelby requisitions the minifin to get a closer look at the underwater pyramid, Diane assigns a reluctant Jason as his pilot. Near the pyramid, they encounter a group of commandos and come under attack.

title: The Taking of Hostages
description: Budds Praxis begins moving their equipment onto ORCA, including several nuclear weapons. Jason and Brett travel to the underwater pyramid to propose a meeting with Malakat of Neri's behalf.

title: The Red Virus
description: Paul and Brett Bates are given an audience with the Global Union's Madam President to voice their opposition to Praxis's adversarial stand against the aliens, they are granted an immediate suspension of all attack preparations.

title: Before the Countdown
description: As the red virus spreads through the ocean, Jason must restrain Neri from going to Charlie's aid. Through the secret passage from her cell, Mera gains access to the central core of the pyramid and uses its power to send a telepathic message to Neri.

title: The Countdown
description: With an attack against the aliens pending, all non-essential personnel are being evacuated from ORCA. Louis informs agent Shelby that Hauser has kept Ilona of the evacuation list which leads to Praxis discovering that she and her mother are both aliens.

title: The Ice Melts
description: With the melting of the polar icecaps well under way, Malakat prepares for the invasion of Earth with seeming ambivalence towards the red virus.

title: The Blood Test
description: As Praxis again prepares to launch their nuclear torpedo at the pyramid, commandos storm ORCA allowing Shersheba and Malakat to seize control of the station.

title: The Queen
description: Asleep on her island late at night, Neri has a vision of her mother, she tells Neri that it is "her time" but Neri admits that she is afraid of what is to come.
